duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver competent and skilled care to patients under the direction of a physician or Registered Nurse.
Deliver care with a team-orientation and emphasis on customer relations.
Understand limitations, reports pertinent data to RN or Manager.

education_certification.credential: High School Graduate or equivalent (GED) certificate. Paramedic certificate or license. One year experience as paramedic preferred. Current BLS, PALS Certification. Continuing education requirements for certification/licensure as required by the Texas Department of State Health Services.
